thread.title: BRIEF-Dada Reports Provisional Results Of Dali Italy Bidco's Takeover Bid

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dada Reports Provisional Results Of Dali Italy Bidco's Takeover Bid
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - DADA SPA:
* REPORTED ON WEDNESDAY THE PROVISIONAL RESULTS OF THE TAKEOVER BID ON DADA SHARES LAUNCHED BY DALI ITALY BIDCO
* REPORTS 5.2 MILLION SHARES TENDERED, CORRESPONDING TO 28.6 PCT OF DADAâ€˜S SHARE CAPITAL
* TOTAL VALUE OF THE SHARES TENDERED IS EUR 20.9 MLN * DALI ITALY BIDCO TO OWN 92.1 PCT OF DADA * DALI ITALY BIDCO WILL NOT RESTORE THE FREE FLOAT AND WILL PROCEED WITH OBLIGATION TO PURCHASE THE REMAINING SHARES
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
